name: U.F.O Invasion
overview: Earth is under attack from Unidentified flying objects (U.F.Os), Your mission is to destroy as many UFO's as you can, but bear in mind we only have 5 Fighter Ships to do this, Good Luck Pilot. Only 5 Lives and no Extra Lives. Single Shot and limited Reach. 22 Levels and then Loops. Hi-Score Arcade Attack Gameplay. Released as part of the 2021 SEUCK competition
